queries.title: Optional 4 - Common Table Expressions
queries.description: Optional Common Table Expressions (CTE) (cf 4.5 in ADQL-2.1): WITH.

query.adql: WITH alpha_subset AS ( SELECT * FROM stars WHERE mod(id, 10) = 0 ) SELECT ra, dec FROM alpha_subset WHERE ra > 10 AND ra < 20

SELECT * FROM ( WITH alpha_subset AS ( SELECT * FROM stars WHERE mod(id, 10) = 0 ) SELECT ra, dec FROM alpha_subset WHERE ra > 10 AND ra < 20 ) AS db_stars INNER JOIN TAP_UPLOAD.my_stars ON 1=CONTAINS(POINT(db_stars.ra, db_stars.dec), CIRCLE(my_stars.ra, my_stars.dec, 1./60))

WITH alpha_subset AS ( WITH my_stars_subset AS ( SELECT * FROM TAP_UPLOAD.my_stars FROM mag < 1 ) SELECT * FROM stars JOIN my_stars_subset AS subset ON 1=CONTAINS(POINT(stars.ra, stars.dec), CIRCLE(subset.ra, subset.dec, 1./60)) ) SELECT * FROM alpha_subset
